Produced by Carlos Pagan
Five Membership Types
Scroll down this page to select a Membership Option!
Dear Friends,
.
I’d be hard-pressed to come up with an opportunity more satisfying than sharing with you the excitement and pleasure of supporting Jazz in our community. Each season includes nearly a hundred events including free concerts, afternoon performances, intimate evening cabarets, trolley pub crawls, boat excursions and our week-long festival in March
In addition to the joy of these performances, the Jazz Club is very proud of its collaboration with Westcoast Black Theatre Troupe in bringing the Jazzlinks integrated arts program into all Sarasota and Manatee county high schools; and of providing, through the generosity of its members, nearly $30,000 in scholarships each year to young musicians pursuing their jazz studies in higher education. In 2019 the club introduced a high school jazz band competition that has grown each year!
All of this is a very big deal, and the members of The Jazz Club of Sarasota have been doing this for more than Forty Years!
Become a Member!
Be a part of this special, active community.
Help make Jazz an even more vital part of life here; and, enjoy the many benefits of membership.
Ed Linehan
,  Jazz Club Board of Directors Membership Coordinator
1,011 Members and Growing!
Member Benefits Include:
up to $500+ in reduced TICKETS
Weekly Eblasts of Jazz Events
3 Issues of "Sarasota Jazz Sounds” Magazine
Member Support from JCS Office
Opportunities to serve on committees planning, promoting and managing events
Free Luxury Bus Transportation to and from The Jazz Cruise
And we are working to expand these benefits in the coming year.
Join our mailing list for the latest news
